title: 12.5" GLASS BLUE EVIL LUCKY EYE ORNATE SUN STARS MOON & ELEPHANT AMULET HANGING WINDOW CHARM
description: This beautiful Turkish Evil Eye / Lucky Eye amulet is made out of glass and Metal. This is hand made so no 2 Glass eyes are the same! The design is of a Silver & Blue Sun with Evil Eyes going around the outer edge. On the inside of the Sun is a Silver Crescent Moon and stars. At the top of the Sun is an Ornate Flower with a evil eye in the center. Attached to the bottom of the Sun is 4 double tier Flower shape evil eyes dangling. In the center is a silver elephant that has a dangling silver chain that holds a large glass evil eye amulet. Dimensions are approximately 12.5" long from the top of the hanger to the bottom. The Sun Design is 5" in diameter.
